licences.name: odc-pddl
licences.title: Open Data Commons Public Domain Dedication and Licence (PDDL)

fields.name: seismic
fields.description: result of shift seismic hazard assessment in the mine working obtained by the seismic method (a - lack of hazard, b - low hazard, c - high hazard, d - danger state)

fields.name: seismoacoustic
fields.description: result of shift seismic hazard assessment in the mine working obtained by the seismoacoustic method

fields.name: shift
fields.description: information about type of a shift (W - coal-getting, N -preparation shift)

fields.name: genergy
fields.description: seismic energy recorded within previous shift by the most active geophone (GMax) out of geophones monitoring the longwall

fields.name: gpuls
fields.description: a number of pulses recorded within previous shift by GMax

fields.name: gdenergy
fields.description: a deviation of energy recorded within previous shift by GMax from average energy recorded during eight previous shifts

fields.name: gdpuls
fields.description: a deviation of a number of pulses recorded within previous shift by GMax from average number of pulses recorded during eight previous shifts

fields.name: ghazard
fields.description: result of shift seismic hazard assessment in the mine working obtained by the seismoacoustic method based on registration coming form GMax only

fields.name: nbumps
fields.description: the number of seismic bumps recorded within previous shift

fields.name: nbumps2
fields.description: the number of seismic bumps (in energy range [10^2,10^3)) registered within previous shift

fields.name: nbumps3
fields.description: the number of seismic bumps (in energy range [10^3,10^4)) registered within previous shift

fields.name: nbumps4
fields.description: the number of seismic bumps (in energy range [10^4,10^5)) registered within previous shift

fields.name: nbumps5
fields.description: the number of seismic bumps (in energy range [10^5,10^6)) registered within the last shift

fields.name: nbumps6
fields.description: the number of seismic bumps (in energy range [10^6,10^7)) registered within previous shift

fields.name: nbumps7
fields.description: the number of seismic bumps (in energy range [10^6,10^7)) registered within previous shift

fields.name: nbumps89
fields.description: the number of seismic bumps (in energy range [10^6,10^7)) registered within previous shift

fields.name: energy
fields.description: the number of seismic bumps (in energy range [10^6,10^7)) registered within previous shift

fields.name: maxenergy
fields.description: the maximum energy of the seismic bumps registered within previous shift

fields.name: class
fields.description: the decision attribute - "1" means that high energy seismic bump occurred in the next shift ("hazardous state"), "0" means that no high energy seismic bumps occurred in the next shift ("non-hazardous state")
